divs: sighting detailsbabylon - while walking the dog, i noticed a triangle of lights moving in thesky. there were three steady lights with one flashing in the middle. all werewhite. it appeared to resemble the sighting in selden in june. however itsmovement was not unusualit looked like unconventional aircraft lights. the flight appeared to be overgreat south bay. while i tried to follow it, it disappeared behind treetopsit was at a fairly low elevation. when i last spotted it, it may have beenhoovering. i dont think it was a helicopter - there was no noise.balloon\blimp?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Babylon
This sighting has never been favorited.
